about_the_game:
Story set in a country ruled by beastmen, where your magic power and upbringing determines your fate.

You are a mere human and your goal is to assist your half-beastmen childhood friend Mirika in proving her worth and becoming successful magic blacksmith.

There is only one catch - her magic talents are pitiful. Maybe... if you can find solution to this problem, she will finally look at you in a different way.


Take on the role of magical smithery manager!

You will need to:
- acquire materials in the dungeons;
- remove impurities from ore and smelt high-quality ingots;
- learn new recipes and craft weapons for sale!

And the most important thing: make your boss fall in love with you! Raise her affection level, aid her in studying intricacies of arcane theory, progress through the story and help her become the best magic blacksmith in the capital city.








Engaging Visual Storytelling 
Dive into a hand-dawn, vivid fantasy world of the game, full of adventures, mystery and, of course, love! 

Interactive Sex Scenes
Ready to explore your desires? Kiss, touch and caress your lovely boss wherever you want in immersive, interactive sex scenes. Whether you're teasing her breasts or pleasuring her deeply, she'll respond to your every move in ways that will keep you captivated.

Affection System
Winning hearts isn't easy, but oh so rewarding. Navigate the fine line between love and hate as you earn Mirika's trust and affection. Make your boss fall head over heels for you and unlock special, intimate moments together.

Dressing Room 
Style Mirika's outfits to suit your tastes. Choose from a range of clothes that she’ll wear in both sex scenes and affection moments.

Various Mini-Games
Venture into dungeon to gather resources, wield magic to refine materials and craft powerful weapons. Running your magical smithery is a thrilling challenge — are you up for it?
